description: Situated on the seventh floor with panoramic views of the city, this restaurant is an excellent choice for a light lunch, a cocktail or an informal dinner. Two young brothers from Naples are at the helm here, creating traditional Italian and Lombardian dishes with a creative and contemporary touch.
